Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @gigamesh sorry I didn't see your question, `hushd` is in the main hush3.git repo: https://github.com/MyHush/hush3/blob/master/src/hushd

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> you can symlink it or just copy that script there

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Download this raw script and `chmod +x 755 hushd`: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MyHush/hush3/master/src/hushd @gigamesh

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> or you can do `ln -sf ../hush3/src/hushd` , if you are in SD directory and your hush3 repo is in the same directory as your SD repo

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> then you should be able to start SD normally and it will find all the things

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> My guess is it tells you to run `fetch-params` because latest KMD doesn't yet know that HUSH doesn't need to download some stuff

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I just discovered a fun little thing

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> 1 month ago, Zcash decided to throw their hat into the ring of "multi-part memos", which you might imagine, Hush has opinions about: https://github.com/zcash/zips/pull/247/commits/16ee90dea840757abef7db5ccff4274a6594c5cc

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Zcash is planning to support 64KB memos, one day in the distant future

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> So now it's a race, who will win? Hush deploying 200KB memos to mainnet or Zcash deploying their 64KB memos to their mainnet?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> TLDR: I am trying to find nice things to say about that ZIP, because I respect str4d, but can't

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> that ZIP is crap and Hush and HushList are miles ahead of them, imho

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I just found it, and I am currently trying to formulate better constructive criticism, other than "this is shit"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I can see that ZEC + HUSH will diverge how they use the memo field, and that is fine. HushList Protocol is superior

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Zcash is free to do what they want, even tho it seems dumb

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <evich> @dukeleto thanks 😍
